name: 探灵笔记-古墓地宫系列：穆正英·竹纹绉得罗（附送29999灵币）
detailed_description:
· tomb dungeon -- mu zhengying · bamboo crepe delo ·DLC (with 29999 spirit coin) includes clothes of the character mu zhengying · bamboo crepe delo, with 29999 spirit coin attached to DLC.



"Ling frost do section no one to see, all day to be open to phoenix"

This lifetime gets the teacher to admonish, is really three lucky. Master did not return, ACTS son is willing to accept the teacher's ambition, carrying water according to the universe, holding lingfu life ghosts and gods, to save the world as their own responsibility, just wait for master to return......
